extendedInfo.description: Drivers Ed Arkansas is brought to you free of charge by DriversEd.com!! _________________________________________ Need a license in Arkansas? Study anytime, any place with Drivers Ed Arkansas for any Android device.FREE from DriversEd.com, the leader in online drivers education, this full-featured study companion can quiz you from a database of more than 350 MVD questions. Your results are recorded so you can track your progress and review your incorrect answers. Retake past tests as many times as you want to make sure you know the material. Pick the length of each testâtake a test of 5 questions or as many as 100. Itâs your choice! Use the Flash Card feature to quickly study the important facts you need to know for the test.Of course, youâll still need to read the Arkansas Driver's Manual to prepare for the permit test. With Drivers Ed Arkansas, you can download the AR Driver's Manual to your device anytime! After the first download, the manual is saved on your device so you donât have to wait for the download again. The AR manual is an official DMV publication in PDF format. The text is crystal clear (pinch to zoom, just like a web page). This app works with DriversEd.comâs Arkansas drivers education course, which you can take to get your drivers license! DriversEd.com is approved by Road Safety Educators' Association & The Driving School Association of the Americas. Features: + Over 350 questions + Each Quiz pulls random questions, giving you a different quiz each time + Select the number of questions you want in each quiz + Results for each quiz are saved for your review and study. Tests can be retaken. + Download Arkansasâs Drivers Manual so you can read and study any time + Study with flash cards

reviews.title: Fantastic app!
reviews.comment: Read the actual book in pdf format. Took the test a lot and studied the questons I missed.
reviews.author: Renee Aguilar

reviews.title: Excellent App!
reviews.comment: Helped me pass my permit! It\'s a must-download app!
reviews.author: Ashley Mares
